SELECT u.`userid`,u.`username`,u.`usertypeid`,u.`usertypenub`,CONCAT(IFNULL(s.`staffname`,''),IFNULL(stu.`studentname`,''),IFNULL(p.`parentsname`,'')) AS `name`,CONCAT(IFNULL(s.`sex`,''),IFNULL(stu.`sex`,''),IFNULL(p.`sex`,'')) AS `sex`,img.`url` FROM cqj_user AS u LEFT JOIN cqj_staff AS s ON s.`staffid`=u.`usertypeid` AND u.`usertypenub`=0 LEFT JOIN cqj_student AS stu ON stu.`studentid`=u.`usertypeid` AND u.`usertypenub`=1 LEFT JOIN cqj_parents AS p ON p.`parentsid`=u.`usertypeid` AND u.`usertypenub`=2 LEFT JOIN img ON img.`id`=u.`userid` WHERE u.`userid` IN (SELECT (message.sender+messagereceiver.`receiver`-#{userid}) AS uid FROM message INNER JOIN messagereceiver ON message.id=messagereceiver.mid WHERE messagereceiver.receiver=#{userid} OR message.`sender`=#{userid} GROUP BY uid)
